channel-type.label: LogStatus
channel-type.description: Log Event Set Interface 4/5 (Must be a Single-Instance Resource)Data Collection process status: Each bit of this Resource Instance value defines a specific status: 1st LSB 0=running, 1=stopped 2nd LSB 1=LogData contains Valid Data 0=LogData doesnâ€™t contain Valid Data 3rd LSB 1=Error occurred during Data Collection Collection 0=no Error [4th -7th ] LSB : reserved 8th LSB : vendor specific.
